But what if there was a collection to wear year-round? An assortment of clothing that can be layered to accommodate changing temperatures and different periods of the year. Too good to be true? Not quite. Introducing Weatherproof® Vintage, the best brand for men’s essentials to wear year round. Weatherproof Vintage makes pieces for layering, ranging from soft cotton tops, warm sweaters, all season jackets, and pants that feel like your favorite sweats. Instead of struggling to put together outfits as the temperatures change, Weatherproof Vintage makes it easy to stay stylish no matter what the conditions bring. Keep reading to discover the five essential Weatherproof® Vintage pieces for layering throughout the year. Key Takeaways The entire Weatherproof® Vintage line features durable constructions, premium materials, and innovative designs that bypass trends for truly timeless style. The collection comprises tops, sweaters, pants, and outerwear, all of which can easily be layered to accommodate different seasons. For the ultimate building blocks for any outfit, we recommend choosing a henley, flannel, sweater, trucker jacket, and a pair of cords that can be worn individually or together as a complete set. As the seasons change, so does your wardrobe. But what if there was a collection to wear year-round? An assortment of clothing that can be layered to accommodate changing temperatures and different periods of the year.

Too good to be true? Not quite.

Introducing Weatherproof® Vintage, the best brand for men’s essentials to wear year round. Weatherproof Vintage makes pieces for layering, ranging from soft cotton tops, warm sweaters, all season jackets, and pants that feel like your favorite sweats. Instead of struggling to put together outfits as the temperatures change, Weatherproof Vintage makes it easy to stay stylish no matter what the conditions bring.

Keep reading to discover the five essential Weatherproof® Vintage pieces for layering throughout the year.

Key Takeaways

The entire Weatherproof® Vintage line features durable constructions, premium materials, and innovative designs that bypass trends for truly timeless style. The collection comprises tops, sweaters, pants, and outerwear, all of which can easily be layered to accommodate different seasons. For the ultimate building blocks for any outfit, we recommend choosing a henley, flannel, sweater, trucker jacket, and a pair of cords that can be worn individually or together as a complete set.

Keep reading to find out what sets Weatherproof® Vintage apart from other menswear brands.

In This Article

  1. Our Picks
  2. Why We Love Weatherproof Vintage
  3. Final Thoughts

Long Sleeve Brushed Jersey Henley

Nothing works better as a base layer than a henley. Easy to dress up but perfectly at home in a casual wardrobe, this super soft shirt will carry you through every season without breaking a sweat. Since it’s made from jersey cotton, this henley is an ideal weight for layering – throw a sweater on top to lock in heat or wear it with your favorite trucker jacket for an easy going autumn outfit. If you start to heat up, unbutton the placket for a breath of fresh air.

Material: Premium jersey cotton | Sizes: S – 2XL | Colors: 6

Long Sleeve Burnout Flannel

It’s an undisputed fact that a flannel is one of the most versatile pieces a man can own. Wear it open over a henley or rock it solo with a pair of cords, this flannel is a lightweight layer that adds some dimension to an otherwise dull outfit. The allover plaid embodies classic Americana. Breathable flannel is soft, comfortable, and about to be the most reached-for shirt in your rotation.

Material: Cotton, polyester | Sizes: S – 2XL | Colors: 5

Chunky Cable Crew Sweater

It’s past time for men to swap out the worn out hoodies for something at once more sophisticated and simpler. Cable knit is timeless and sleek, the ultimate upgrade for the modern gentleman. Crafted from a soft Alpaca wool blend, this sweater is the ultimate wear-everywhere layer, from cool summer evenings to the depths of winter. Not to mention the unbeatable price-to-quality ratio. A high-end wool blend sweater for under €100? Unheard of.

Material: Cotton, polyester, wool | Sizes: S – 2XL | Colors: 3

Twill Trucker Jacket

Like your favorite pair of blue jeans, trucker jackets only get better with age, granting them status as a must-have layer for any fashion-forward man. With a sherpa collar and durable twill construction, this jacket will see you through it all, I’m quite partial to this model, given the roomy pockets and quilted interior. It’s also a nice change of pace from more basic denim truckers. If you can’t decide between a jean jacket and a puffer, this model gives you the best of both worlds wrapped up in an impossibly stylish package.

Material: Twill, nylon, sherpa | Sizes: S – 2XL | Colors: 2

Wide Wale Cord Pants

Imagine one pair of pants you can wear year-round for every occasion – work, weekends, evenings out, and beyond. And what’s more, imagine those pants are the most comfortable pair you own. These cords are a fail proof layer that will carry you further than jeans or slacks. They have a dressy look but feel like sweats, giving you all the comfort without sacrificing style. With an added bit of stretch to the cotton construction, these cords have a drawstring waist, plenty of pockets, and three neutral colorways to choose from.

Material: Cotton (corduroy) spandex | Sizes: S – 2XL | Colors: 3

Why We Love Weatherproof® Vintage

Unbeatable Value

It’s increasingly difficult to find well constructed clothing at an affordable price point. But Weatherproof® Vintage makes top quality pieces accessible to the average guy. Weatherproof® Vintage strives to give every man the option to dress well without breaking the bank.

Top Tier Craftsmanship

Weatherproof® Vintage places quality craftsmanship above all else, and uses premium materials that only get better with wear The brand uses the finest materials, spanning cotton and wool to durable canvas and rugged twill. Coupled with next level expertise in clothing construction, Weatherproof® Vintage’s line is designed to withstand life, wherever it leads.

Wear-Everywhere Wardrobe Staples

Rather than pieces that you reach for every once in a while, Weatherproof® Vintage specializes in wardrobe staples that will be the backbone of every outfit, no matter the season. Designed to wear year-round for every occasion,  the line is easy to style and slots in with what you already own, complementing and completing any man’s closet.

Final Thoughts About Weatherproof Vintage

Weatherproof® Vintage makes layering up and looking good easier than ever. Rather than struggling to find pieces that work well together, the entire brand collection is brimming with men’s essentials that can be worn independently or sported as layers. Made from high-quality materials with next-level craftsmanship, Weatherproof Vintage’s menswear line should be your first port of call for year-round staples that will never go out of style.
